text: Two patients presented with atypical presentation of Zika infection to Sengkang Health, Alexandra Hospital during the recent Zika outbreak in Singapore in August 2016. Madam A presented with isolated generalized rash with no fever, joint pain, myalgia, headache or conjunctivitis. Mr. B presented with isolated fever of 39.4 °C with no rash, joint pain, myalgia, headache or conjunctivitis. Both patients' blood Zika Polymerase Chain Reactions were positive at the time of presentation.
